ideaItems.title: AI-to-mechanistic: The extractFromJsxAttribute utility correctly handles most cases but returns confident: false for template literals with interpolations. A future improvement could expand confidence for template literals where the bare class token is always in the static portion.

ideaItems.title: Add Jest unit test with fixture JSON mock for gsc-url-inspection-batch.ts extraction logic
ideaItems.body: TC-01 through TC-04 validated by code inspection only; fixture-based test would catch regression on return-type refactors

ideaItems.title: Confirm richResultsResult field presence on next monitoring run against amalfi-positano-bus (one indexed URL) to validate API response shape empirically
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 delivered with optional-chaining fallbacks; no live API response with structured data yet observed for any seed URL

ideaItems.title: Wire lastUpdated through HowToGetHereContent to unlock datePublished on 31 EN transport pages
ideaItems.body: transport pages have no datePublished structured data; monitoring will capture HowTo detection instead of Article when they index

ideaItems.title: E2E coverage for J2 error paths (validation failure, pipeline failure, empty-input 409)
ideaItems.body: TC-09-03 added only the success path; the plan explicitly deferred error-path coverage as non-goals. Now that the success path is tested, error paths are the natural next expansion.

ideaItems.title: /how-to-get-here server-resolved hero H1 (sub-track C)
ideaItems.body: TASK-11 deferred useHowToGetHereContent audit — HowToGetHereIndexContent hook needs investigation before server-resolved props pattern can be applied safely.

ideaItems.title: RSC conversion for RoomsStructuredData + ExperiencesStructuredData
ideaItems.body: TASK-10 investigation confirmed both use useCurrentLanguage() (client hooks) but all underlying data is static — full RSC conversion is feasible and would eliminate the client component boundary.
ideaItems.suggested_action: create card (P3 SSR, low urgency post-launch)

ideaItems.title: ~~Add view_item_list assertions to the Playwright smoke test~~
ideaItems.body: ~~Add view_item_list assertions to the Playwright smoke test~~ | Actioned: plan brikette-smoke-view-item-list archived 2026-02-26 — view_item_list added to REQUIRED_EVENTS in ga4-funnel-smoke.mjs

ideaItems.title: Add IT locale /book route to the static export to stop the redirect to /en
ideaItems.body: Smoke test confirmed /it/prenota redirects to /en — IT-speaking visitors get an English booking page

ideaItems.title: Track GA4 funnel drop-off in Explorations once custom dimensions are visible (48h)
ideaItems.body: Full funnel confirmed firing; no conversion rate baseline exists yet
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (check at T+7 days when custom dimensions propagate)

ideaItems.title: Automate rounded → rounded-lg lint rule to prevent recurrence
ideaItems.body: 12+ bare rounded instances found across 7 screens in this plan; same violations were found in Phase 1–3; no lint rule currently prevents reintroduction
ideaItems.suggested_action: spike (ESLint custom rule or Tailwind lint plugin)

ideaItems.title: Extension.tsx debug console.log removal
ideaItems.body: 4 debug console.log calls flagged with TODO comments in Extension.tsx during TASK-11; removal deferred as logic-entangled per non-goal
ideaItems.suggested_action: create card (code quality, TASK-11 already has TODO markers in-place)

ideaItems.title: Sweep PaymentsView.test.tsx to use data-cy attribute
ideaItems.body: pre-existing test failure discovered during Wave 3; root cause is testIdAttribute: "data-cy" jest config vs data-testid in test mock — a one-line fix in the test file

ideaItems.title: Automate periodic smoke test runs against production (e.g. weekly cron) so GA4 event regressions are caught without manual operator invocation
ideaItems.body: smoke test is manual-only; value of the assertion is bounded by run frequency

ideaItems.title: Add CI drift check step using check-process-improvements to catch SKIP_SIMPLE_GIT_HOOKS bypasses
ideaItems.body: SKIP_SIMPLE_GIT_HOOKS=1 is used by bos-export and would bypass the hook
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (bos-export does not touch plan files, so this is low risk in practice)

ideaItems.title: Add check_url_strict coverage to other localized booking entry points (e.g., /de/buchen, /fr/reserver)
ideaItems.body: TASK-04 strict check plumbing is now reusable via healthcheck-strict-routes input in reusable-app.yml

ideaItems.title: Extend smoke test to cover representative IT locale routes (rooms, experiences)
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 confirmed IT book present, but no other IT-locale routes are smoke-tested

ideaItems.title: The reflection debt emitter currently runs as a TypeScript script triggered by pnpm --filter scripts startup-loop:generate-process-improvements. The five-category scan in the pre-fill step is still LLM reasoning (agent reads build context and scans). A future mechanistic check could diff the New Idea Candidates section of committed results-reviews against the five category labels and flag missing categories as a lint warning.
ideaItems.body: this build added a structured five-category checklist to step 2, revealing that compliance checking (are all five categories addressed?) is a deterministic pattern-match, not a reasoning task

ideaItems.title: The wave build execution for this plan (three independent S-effort markdown edits) was orchestrated manually. A docs-patch skill that handles batches of bounded markdown edits to SKILL.md files (verify current state, apply edit, verify result, commit) would eliminate the lp-do-build overhead for this class of purely-additive process-doc changes.
ideaItems.body: all three tasks were trivial file edits with identical Red/Green/Refactor structure

ideaItems.title: Extend UI polish to Phase 4 screens (16 unread screens identified in fact-find) using same pattern
ideaItems.body: All Phase 1–3 screens now polished; remaining screens have visible visual gap
ideaItems.suggested_action: spike — quick read of all 16 Phase 4 screen root components to establish complexity brackets before starting a new plan

ideaItems.title: ReceptionSkeleton pattern should be documented as the canonical loading state for reception app tables
ideaItems.body: Component created and used in 2 screens (CheckinsTable, Checkout); will be needed by Phase 4 screens
ideaItems.suggested_action: create card — add to design system notes or code comment in shared component

ideaItems.title: Add validate:launch-media to CI so media contract failures block merges
ideaItems.body: contract validator currently run manually; new SKUs could be merged without images

ideaItems.title: Expand catalog from 3 to target SKU count with production imagery
ideaItems.body: launch media contract passes for 3 active SKUs — catalog is minimal for launch

ideaItems.title: Real-device performance spot-check before public launch
ideaItems.body: build-record flags this as the only remaining pre-launch gate; a QA matrix is already drafted at artifacts/real-device-qa-matrix.md

ideaItems.title: Automated policy-fact consistency check across templates
ideaItems.body: three policy facts manually verified across 125 templates; any future policy change has no automated catch

ideaItems.title: Post-stay review workflow using T178 as the trigger template
ideaItems.body: T178 built and lint-passing but review-link URL still a placeholder; workflow not yet activated

ideaItems.title: Template selection rate monitoring dashboard or weekly report
ideaItems.body: build-record recommends running draft_signal_stats after 4 weeks; no scheduled monitoring exists

ideaItems.title: Add automated constraint-graph cycle check to CI
ideaItems.body: cycles were manually verified via generate-stage-operator-views.ts; no automated CI gate exists

ideaItems.title: Visual diff test for process-map HTML to catch silent regressions
ideaItems.body: swim-lane layout was browser-verified manually; no regression test exists

ideaItems.title: Add E2E coverage for sync success path once scripts are restored
ideaItems.body: test:e2e only covers J1 happy path; J2 has no E2E test

ideaItems.title: Restore or port missing XA sync scripts to unblock J2
ideaItems.body: scripts/src/xa/validate-xa-inputs.ts and run-xa-pipeline.ts are absent; sync journey is deterministically blocked

ideaItems.title: Add filesystem discovery smoke test to CI
ideaItems.body: rebuild-discovery-index.sh is validated manually; no automated regression guard on its output shape

ideaItems.title: Audit existing in-flight plans for stale BOS frontmatter fields
ideaItems.body: Templates cleaned but older active plans may still carry Business-OS-Integration/Card-ID fields

ideaItems.title: Add datePublished to monitoring baseline to track when guide pages first appear with valid structured data in search results
ideaItems.body: T+0 baseline has 29 unknown URLs; structured data correctness cannot be validated until pages are indexed

ideaItems.title: Enable Google Indexing API and test URL submission eligibility
ideaItems.body: All 5 test submissions returned HTTP 403 — API not enabled in GCP project 98263641014
ideaItems.suggested_action: spike (operator enables API at GCP console, then re-runs 5 test URLs)

ideaItems.title: Wire lastUpdated prop through HowToGetHereContent to unlock datePublished on transport pages
ideaItems.body: 31 EN transport pages have no lastUpdated in RouteDefinition; datePublished fix was deferred from TASK-03

ideaItems.title: Add session_id or caller_pid to governed telemetry event schema to enable actor attribution in future zombie incidents.
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 could not confirm actor identity with 80% confidence; no session metadata in events.jsonl.
